channel.title: Game using minimax algorithm
channel.description: For my artificial intelligence class I have to create a [b]simple[/b] game that supports player vs player offline gameplay. After a few weeks I have to implement the minimax algorithm to replace one of / both the players. Any of you know a fun / original game that could benefit from this algorithm? Just looking for some ideas. Thanks!
